attributes.action: stop interfering with the British public, thinking you know better!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please do not add flouride to our water. Studies  have linked high levels of fluoride to bone cancer and brittle bone disease and rot the stomach. Please do not add folic acid to bread! Stop interfering with the British public! Encourage healthy eating and better hygiene. Allow the pubic to choose for themselves how to live their lives, starting with their own health!
